status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cnpdn","text":"Prepare the correct amount of mastermix of Qubit reagent in buffer for your samples and standards. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en2jn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2naoh","text":"Note: A calibration is required for every usage of the Qubit, so always include standards in the calculations. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69m55","text":"Reagent and buffer mastermix is light sensitive. Wrap the tube in foil to protect from light. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4337m","text":"Reagent must be diluted 1:200 in buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6de65","text":"Each standard requires 190 uL of mastermix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ei37n","text":"Each sample requires 190-199 uL of mastermix. (You can put anywhere from 1 to 10 uL of sample in each qubit assay). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfivm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ss92","text":"Select the reagent calculator on the Qubit Fluorometer main menu. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oh2e","text":"Ensure that your calculations match up with the numbers calculated by the Qubit for mastermix preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67cjk","text":"Go back to home screen and select the dsDNA assay: Broad Range. Select \"Read Standards\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nunm","text":"Input Standard 1, then read. Then input Standard 2. Generate calibration curve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er21i","text":"Prepare Standards 1 and 2. Each requires 10 uL of standard and 190 uL of mastermix. Keep the standards on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8ard","text":"Prepare samples: Aliquot the appropriate amount of mastermix (190-199 uL) into each 0.5 mL qubit assay tube. Add the appropriate amount of sample (1-10 uL) into each tube, and let sit for 2 minutes to incubate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5aakt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aatt8","text":"After incubation, the sample fluorescence is stable for 3 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2g1uh","text":"Enter what sample volume you added to each tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8005j","text":"After reading one tube, just take out the sample and put in the next tube. This way all samples will be saved under the same assay data set.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5thp5","text":"When finished, upload the data onto a USB. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: SOP16v1_TGD_Qubit_dsDNA_BR_Assays_for_DNAQuantification
